text:
I've noticed a bunch of errors coming through google search console for the CTA links... Anyone else seeing this?

*Redirect error* (As defined by Google Search Console): The URL was a redirect error. Could be one of the following types: it was a redirect chain that was too long; it was a redirect loop; the redirect URL eventually exceeded the max URL length; there was a bad or empty URL in the redirect chain.

I have a client complaining about the rediculously long tracking code URL’s used for HubSpot Email tracking. Saying their security team is really upset about how the links don’t even show the path causing them to look like phishing URLs.
<https://www.DOMAIN.com/e2t/c/*W7dbpwZ8rSjqmW5jtGW694xlw-0/*VljV4H5nRBtfW4ssRfM7y_8tH0/5/f18dQhb0SfHw8YXNlsW3zclkz7PKkCqW56NNCW2z9bNSW2KBfjg6mdttXW7s5Q341Sj4RbW32GyZ-8-y10rW8_dDry4bH_qwN2M-NSnYT2jkW6P4lCX3WddQjW6Pkt_V62_rWzW4MM3148tzC3FW8q-1tW6b-vF0N67h1zcQC5z2VPC2cV7dLlg-W5v_z1X3LPkXSW1rdT804YGM4sW4swtWN5CQyz4W1qqW3J1nhKcnV8zpQJ96kQC0W2B2M9m39RdmpW4sNqZG1nhy-lW6S0HGn5zYZZMVc7Tk-22PXRQW4WJR7J66XTK5VTq6y_5s17l5W4PkBg56BzJrnN45Ly2MkwRN4W8l0pcH7Bk1kdW1wtkC02Q-Cc3W5CGWQK1KQ4JFW7mtWSc3ZQ9DMW9dwsP343jZPlW5KF1mH4gKR0NW7C4f105LDR30W6XCs3V2pglVTW6vc-Z64cHgNtd_h93F04>

This is an example of the url that is being generated for their homepage… (domain obviously redacted)

I can’t blame them for being upset here. It’s so long that when you hover over it, you can’t see the majority of the URL by hovering it. It’s also not even using a query parameter for the tracking, it’s straight up a different URL.

The length of this is also pretty extensive. I get that we don’t want false data by someone accidentally modifying the url or something but sheesh that’s 540 characters being added to just the homepage url

This issue is not specific to this client either, another of our clients is having similarly ridiculously long links and the links do not show the path of the page at all. not sure if this is how it’s supposed to be working, but I don’t recall this happening before. I thought it was just a query param with like a 10 character tracking ID being used for tracking.
*The client is pretty adamant about this is there a feature or atleast a planned feature where you can turn off email tracking per campaign or per email?*
turning off the tracking globally and turning it back on after sending the email is not an option - they have automated emails that they do want this tracking in.
Anyone know if there are atleast any features like this planned?

One of my clients has a similar issue. They have a CTA that links to a `mailto:` href, and Google Search Console reports a bad redirect for this one. Think it started happening after the client updated to the new GSC.
hi, somebody has worked with some kind of “whatsapp integration”?
